name: Blue Rabbit: Creation
description:
Everything is explained in the game

This is meant to be a squeal  of the original game on steam. This is due to the fact that the game came out of April 1st and so now I am making another one. This was going to be DLC but it was too good to be DLC.

W - move forward

D - move right

A - move left

S - move backward

Q - jump

M - Create block

E -  Delete save

ANY NUMBER - change

pen - test out your creation

Honestly I just wanted the one rick roll countdown thing on YouTube to count down to my game's release date.

Click Download 👇
